sentences.en: a pattern made with coloured pegs on a board
sentences.cn: 木板上彩钉构成的图形

sentences.en: a table fitted together with pegs
sentences.cn: 一张用钉子钉起来的桌子

sentences.en: Hang your overcoat on the peg in the hall.
sentences.cn: 把你的大衣挂在门厅的挂衣钩上.

sentences.en: He has not a peg to hang on.
sentences.cn: 他一点借口也找不出来.

sentences.en: His work jacket hung on the peg in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服挂在厨房里的挂钩上。

sentences.en: I thought the oldest were going to peg out.
sentences.cn: 我想最老的那些人快蹬腿了。

sentences.en: I took off my poncho, shook it out, and hung it on a peg by the door.
sentences.cn: 我脱下了披风，抖落干净，然后挂在门上的挂衣钉上。

sentences.en: I went out to peg out our assembly area.
sentences.cn: 我出去用木桩标出我们的集合区。

sentences.en: Instead of dining in top restaurants and wearing expensive suits, he likes to eat hamburgers and buys clothes off the peg.
sentences.cn: 比起穿着昂贵的套装到高档饭店吃饭，他更喜欢吃汉堡、买成衣。

sentences.en: Just crank up your hearing aid a peg or two.
sentences.cn: 把助听器调高一两个刻度就可以。

sentences.en: Peg down netting over the top to keep out leaves.
sentences.cn: 用销钉在顶上加固防护网，防止叶子落入。

sentences.en: Sam was left at the dinner table with Peg.
sentences.cn: 萨姆被留下来陪佩格一起吃晚餐。

sentences.en: Sarah hung her coat on the peg.
sentences.cn: 萨拉把外套挂在衣钩上。

sentences.en: Taylor is clearly the wrong man for the job—a square peg in a round hole.
sentences.cn: 泰勒显然不是做这份工作的合适人选——简直就是方枘圆凿。

sentences.en: The Bank wants to peg rates at 9%.
sentences.cn: 该银行想把利率限定在9%。

sentences.en: There's a peg near the door to hang your coat on.
sentences.cn: 门边有个钩子可以挂衣服。

sentences.en: We thought it was time they were brought down a peg or two.
sentences.cn: 我们认为是时候煞煞他们的嚣张气焰了。

sentences.en: We'd have liked to see her taken down a peg, but not this way.
sentences.cn: 我们乐意看到她杀威风，但不是用这种方法。

sentences.en: You hang clothes on a peg fixed to a wall or door.
sentences.cn: 你把衣服挂在固定在墙上或门上的挂衣钩上.

words.tran_cn: 疾行；孜孜不倦地做某事

phrases.phrase: a peg to hang a matter on
a square peg in a round hole
phrases.tran_cn: 方枘圆凿，处于与自己能力或性格不合的情形中的人
小幅度调整汇率；浮动钉住
(非正式)（尤指长期）坚持不懈地工作，勤奋地工作
(槌球)（比赛的最后一击）击中标竿
（赛跑或比赛中）降低（对手的）领先地位；消除（对手的）领先地位

phrases.phrase: take someone down a peg or two

trans.tran_cn: 钉，桩，借口，遁词，，（提琴等的）弦钮，尖头物，爪，（晒衣用的）衣夹，（帽）挂
trans.tran_en: a short piece of wood, metal, or plastic that is attached to a wall or fits into a hole, used especially to hang things on or to fasten things together
to set prices, wages etc at a particular level, or set them in relation to something else

trans.tran_cn: 疾行，孜孜不倦地做某事
固定，限制，限定（工资等），在…上钉木钉，用木钉[短桩]钉住
trans.tran_en: to fasten something somewhere with a peg
